wikipedia_page.main: Russell Hunter (18 February 1925 – 26 February 2004) was a Scottish television, stage and film actor. He played Lonely in the TV thriller series Callan, starring Edward Woodward, and shop steward Harry in the Yorkshire Television sitcom The Gaffer (1981–1983) with Bill Maynard. He made guest appearances in well-known series such as The Sweeney, Doctor Who, Taggart, A Touch of Frost and The Bill.
